0: WASHINGTON (AP) â€” U.S. health officials have approved a new generic version of EpiPen, the emergency allergy medication. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The Food and Drug Administration's action Thursday opens the door to more competition for a drug that has faced public outrage over its price tag. The injections are stocked by schools and parents to treat allergic reactions to food and bug bites. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The new generic version will be sold by Teva Pharmaceuticals. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR EpiPen maker Mylan has dominated the $1 billion market for two decades. Competing shots are not widely marketed or prescribed by doctors. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR
